tool_description: Identifies current and predicted stock shortages across locations, prioritizing critical items and providing shortage severity analysis.

minimum_stock_threshold.description: Threshold below which items are considered low stock

error_messages: Invalid threshold: minimum_stock_threshold must be a positive number.
Forecast range error: forecast_days_ahead must be between 1 and 30 days.
Location data unavailable: Some location_ids have no accessible inventory data.
Category filter invalid: Some product_categories are not recognized in the system.
usage: Specify location_ids to monitor for shortages. Adjust minimum_stock_threshold based on your safety stock policies and forecast_days_ahead for planning horizon. Filter by product_categories if focusing on specific items.

current_shortages.description: Items currently below minimum stock threshold

predicted_shortages.description: Items predicted to be short within forecast period

shortage_severity.description: Severity levels (critical, high, medium, low) for each shortage

total_affected_locations.description: Number of locations with shortage issues
